penis.transformationDescription:
Suddenly noticing your penis is fully erect, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] penis shifting into a new form, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as the skin on [npc.her] shaft changes.
[npc.She] now [npc.has] a [style.boldHyena(spitbug penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription(true)].
